name: LIZARDS FROM OUTER SPACE against the Grand Cosmic Squadron
name_original: LIZARDS FROM OUTER SPACE against the Grand Cosmic Squadron
description:
• CHIP ALL THE HUMANS AND ESCAPE THE SQUADRON SOLDIERS

CONTENT: intro + 2 levels

TUTORIAL:

  • move with ARROW KEYS
  • CHIP HUMANS (men with hats)  by moving into them
  • WIN by CHIPPING ALL HUMANS and escaping through the GATE¨
  • AVOID SQUADRON SOLDIERS - they touch you -> GAME OVER
  • CHIPPED HUMANS are stolen by the LIZARDS  in 3 turns, but can be saved by SOLDIERS
  • SOLDIERS can dash to CHIPPED HUMANS

intro song Powerup by Jeremy Blake - Thanks, dude! 
all assets made by Adam and Mikoláš Fišer
